title: Dexter.S04E10.HDTV.MPEG.[REQ]
description:

It sounded like "It's JUST mpeg, and mpeg cannot be better."
Yes, it can. It must be better. ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ I was thinking. DVDs are MPEG. Transport streams of HDTV are MPEG.

No, bitrate is fine.

Problem is when someone thinks it knows, and knows squat.
Here is DVD compliant MPEG with 2 ch. AC3 sound.
